name: Craftopia(itch)
description:
Early prototype and functions as a proof of concept. You can create your own blocks real-time, fly over the world, dig & place blocks, swim. And more.
The game will get its own feeling, which will be 100% adjustable. And we're adding more and more modability options like scripting in the game.
For more info visit: http://eraclegames.com/games/craftopia/
Created with our in-house developed Engine, with custom adjusted systems to smoothen the voxel experience.
